title: A Small Idea to make the Enchantment: Captain, more desirable.
body:
Current:
UNIQUE Passive - Captain: Grants +10% Movement Speed to nearby approaching allied champions.

Small Idea:
UNIQUE Passive - Captain: Grants +10% Movement Speed to nearby approaching allied champions and +1% Damage Per Nearby Allied Champion against Objectives (Towers, Inhibitors, Nexus, Dragon, and Baron.)

Opinions accepted.

replies.body:
I don't actually think they need more power. Just satisfaction.  

I still like picking them up on Janna.

Change it to +10% to allied champions moving in the same direction. Then shorten the range a bit.

This wouldn't change too much gameplay wise it would just make it feel buyable on people who it currently isn't/

> [{quoted}](name=Garrotte,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ycWAVEY6,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2016-02-29T11:06:26.316+0000)
>
> Change it to +10% to allied champions moving in the same direction. Then shorten the range a bit.
> 
> This wouldn't change too much gameplay wise it would just make it feel buyable on people who it currently isn't/

I really like the concept of that. Does seem like you could run into some clarity issues.

I take them the few times I've played Swain.

I'm the captain of the team after all.

I agree that they need something more than just the name though, because that's the only satisfying thing about'em.

I think that would make it mandatory, not desirable.

Personally, I think it's plenty desirable, especially on Supports like Janna or Tanks who go in deep and need allies to follow. I'd like it on Sion, for example.

If it does need buffing, maybe increase it's radius a little.

> [{quoted}](name=Crewx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ycWAVEY6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-29T03:21:47.383+0000)
>
> I think that would make it mandatory, not desirable.
> 
> Personally, I think it's plenty desirable, especially on Supports like Janna or Tanks who go in deep and need allies to follow. I'd like it on Sion, for example.
> 
> If it does need buffing, maybe increase it's radius a little.

It does already have a rather large radius, honestly I thought it was smaller,
I don't think id make it mandatory, as some champions still go for alacrity over anything even in support.
Though captain enchants are under appreciated, they are by no means under powered. Those things are godly.
